### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE spare_parts (
 part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 part_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 quantity INT,
 price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);


CREATE TABLE accessories (
 accessory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 accessory_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 quantity INT,
 price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);


CREATE TABLE repairs (
 repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 part_id INT,
 accessory_id INT,
 description TEXT,
 cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
 CONSTRAINT fk_part_id FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES spare_parts(part_id),
 CONSTRAINT fk_accessory_id FOREIGN KEY (accessory_id) REFERENCES accessories(accessory_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = 10 WHERE part_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE spare_parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturers (
    manufacturer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quantity INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE part_id = 1;
